text.data: Taicho: All the Granbelos generals have been mustered!![0xfc][0x1] What should we do!?[end1][end]
Palpaleos: Patience... If we use a divide-and-conquer strategy,[0xfc][0x1] we can overpower them![end1][end]
The kingdom of Kahna is revived![0xfc][0x1] We can return to Kahna Castle!![end1][end]
